title: Between Magic and Dreams
description: What if, as you read this, you were being saddled with a task that would most certainly ruin your weekend plans? What would you do if you were to look down from this book and see a creature of myth and legend beckoning you to do things that defy common sense? Kwen finds himself in just such a predicament. Follow him on a journey that will either leave him twisting in the depths of oblivion or riding the winds of change because, as it turns out, we’ve never owned our reality… we’re just renting it.
author: Bryan Covington
